data_path.description: Path to the normalized csv dataset.

num_trees.description: Number of trees in the random forest. should be < 50

split_ratio.description: Ratios for splitting the dataset into training, testing, and validation sets.

use_bootstrap.description: Whether to use bootstrap sampling for trees.

training_score.description: Method for evaluating model performance during training. oob_score: Out-of-bag validation, valid_score: Validation set, k_fold_score: K-fold cross validation

metric_score.description: Training evaluation metrics to optimize during model training
metric_score.description_disabled: Automatic flag selection based on dataset characteristics (imbalance analysis)
metric_score.description_overwrite: User flags completely replace automatic detection
metric_score.description_stacked: User flags are combined with auto-detected flags using bitwise OR

extend_base_data.description: Whether to extend the base dataset with new data.

enable_retrain.description: Whether to enable retraining of the model with new data.

enable_auto_config.description: Whether to automatically configure model parameters based on dataset characteristics.

k_folds.description: Number of folds for cross-validation when using k_fold_score.

min_split.description: disabled by default. enable to override min_split_range in training process

max_depth.description: disabled by default. enable to override max_depth_range in training process

impurity_threshold.description: Threshold for impurity in decision trees.

unity_threshold.description: Threshold for unity in decision trees, disabled by default. enable to overwrite
unity_threshold.description_2: If the status is disabled, it will be automatically generated by the program.
